name: Nobushi: Kikouban
description:
Samurai who have fallen into banditry. Though they are called the Nobushi, they do not have a centralized organization.
They possess highly-advanced sword skills and also use crossbows to ambush opponents, using any means to win. Those who have abandoned the title of a martial artist often abandon their dignity as well.
Sometimes they even collude with the Treasure Hoarders or Fatui out of a greed for wealth â€” or simply to survive.

investigation.name: Nobushi
investigation.description: Despite often appearing in groups, the Nobushi do not have a centralized organization. Depending on their temperament or the nature of their crimes, they are also known as the "homeless ones," "vagabonds," "Kairagi," "ne'er-do-wells," or even "the rioters," or just simply known collectively as "those rogues."\nThey are often samurai who have fallen into banditry, and some will even ally themselves with the Treasure Hoarders or the Fatui for survival or monetary gain.
